cannedAcl.description: The Amazon S3 canned ACL that controls access to the object identified by the object key. [Valid values](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/userguide/acl-overview.html#canned-acl).

key.description: The name of the HTTP header.

roleArn.description: The IAM role ARN that allows access to the CloudWatch alarm.
